MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA30 postcode area of Largs. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:50pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Flatt Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:07pm on Saturday, 20 February 2021
